sections.title: With name
sections.content: Display a user's name next to their avatar.

sections.title: Without chevron
sections.content: Hide the chevron icon by setting the :chevron prop to false.

sections.title: Circle avatar
sections.content: Use the circle prop to display a circular avatar.

sections.title: Avatar with initials
sections.content: When no avatar image is provided, initials will be automatically generated from the name or they can be specified directly.
examples: <!-- Automatically generates initials from name --><flux:profile name="Caleb Porzio" /><!-- Specify color... --><flux:profile name="Caleb Porzio" avatar:color="cyan" /><!-- Manually specify initials... --><flux:profile initials="CP" /><!-- Provide name only for avatar initial generation... --><flux:profile avatar:name="Caleb Porzio" />

sections.title: Custom trailing icon
sections.content: Replace the default chevron with a custom icon using the icon:trailing prop.
